---
title: "Manifesto Project - Case Selection"
format: html
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
df <- readRDS("greens_populists_periods.rds")
df |>
  group_by(countryname) |>
  summarise(number_of_manifestos = n()) |>
  kable()

df |>
  group_by(period) |>
  summarise(number_of_manifestos = n()) |>
  kable()

df <- readRDS("greens_populists_wide.rds")
df |> 
  kable()

```
